scripts.dev: npm run label && npm run --prefix src build && cp src/nuxt.config.js functions/nuxt.config.js && cp -R functions/nuxt/dist/ public && cp -R src/static/* public && firebase serve
scripts.start: npm run label && npm run dev
scripts.nuxt-build: npm run label && npm run --prefix src build
scripts.nuxt-test: npm run label &&  npm run --prefix src test
scripts.label: node label.js
